caption:
This image captures two women in a room, both focused intently on decorating cakes. 

The woman in the foreground is standing to the left side, with glasses and wearing a patterned dress; she is using a piping bag to apply icing to a round cake, which is on a turntable to facilitate even decoration. The concentration on her face shows dedication and precision to the task.

The woman in the background, to the right side of the frame, wears a nurse-style uniform in light blue with a white apron, and is also holding a piping bag. She looks on intently at the other woman's work, perhaps learning or waiting for her turn to decorate.

The cakes are placed on a long table, covered with a simple tablecloth, surrounded by various baking tools and other undecorated cakes, which adds to the sense of a cake decorating session or workshop environment. The room appears to be a domestic or perhaps a commercial kitchen, with a simple wood paneled and wallpapered décor typical of perhaps the 1970s or 1980s.

The setting is warmly lighted, likely artificially, giving the scene a cozy, focused ambiance. The entire composition eloquently conveys a moment of skill sharing and careful attention to culinary detail.
title: Cake decorating class, part of continuing education program of Colorado Mountain College, meets in Rifle.
